text: Tiniharule allaha baheka arula'i pujya bana'eka chan, jasale kunai kurako srsti gardainan, baru tiniharu svayam srsti gari'eka chan! Uniharula'i nata aphno haniko adhikara prapta cha nata labhako. Ra uniharula'i nata mrtyuko adhikara prapta cha nata jivanako. Ra nata punah jivita bha'i uthne kurako
